name: Pitchforks & Produce
description:
Pitchforks & Produce

Finally you’re old enough to help with this year’s crop harvest! Your parents are leaving it all up to you. If only you knew the deadly journey to come…

Defeat the enormous crops monsters by racking up crazy combos and dodging their many attacks! Use your little pitchfork to slice through the evil produce and come out alive!

Go through the years as the bosses get harder and harder to see how far you can get!

Made by Medow for Ludum Dare 52 Compo
